10: Lower state: bare hands

x31_p7: Contact judgment distance
x31_s0: Start state

x31_s1_e0: [Attack] Defense
x31_s1_e1: [Attack] Reset attack failure

x31_s2_e1: [General] Short Navi Mesh Check

x31_s3_e0: [General] Reset short navigation mesh check result
x31_s3_e1: [General] Short Navi Mesh Check

x31_s4_e0: [Attack] Melee attack
x31_s4_e1: [Timer] Start timer

x31_s6_w0: [Timer] Stop timer
